description: After a dairy-free breakfast smoothie? This creamy version uses soy milk and is flavoured with cinnamon and apple, and textured with a crunchy LSA mix.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Jan Feb 2021,Low fat,Dairy free
name: Apple & Oats Breakfast Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs LSA mix (linseeds, sunflower seeds & almonds)

recipeInstructions.text: Place apple, milk, LSA mix and oats in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blitz until smooth. Serve topped with extra oats and cinnamon.
